segments.text: I see the sink overflowing, and the water is just spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, completely unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so wobbly, and he’s leaning way too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is waiting for a cookie, and she looks so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip and fall before she even notices the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to regret not paying attention soon enough.
segments.speaker: PAR
